text: "Stefania" (, ) is a 2022 song by Ukrainian folk-rap group Kalush Orchestra. The song represented Ukraine at the Eurovision Song Contest 2022. It is the third song sung entirely in Ukrainian to represent the country at Eurovision, but the second to actually compete at the contest. It won the Eurovision Song Contest 2022 with 631 points, making it the first rap song to win the contest. == References == Category:2022 songs Category:Eurovision Song Contest winning songs Category:Rap songs Category:Songs about war Category:Songs in Ukrainian Category:Ukrainian folk songs
title: Stefania (song)
